item.title: ~~~Can Someone Fix My IPBAN Code?~~~
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“ipban”) && playerRights > 2) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		p.writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, "ipbans");
		p.disconnected = true;
		sM("You have ipbanned "+p.playerName+"!");
                    yell("["+playerName+"] has just IP banned "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to ip ban..");
            }
        }[/code]

item.title: ~~~Can Someone Fix My IPBAN Code?~~~
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok still got 100 errors im i adding the { or something wrong!

[code]
}
if (command.startsWith(“clicks”)
&& (playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“B15”))) {

        if (!LoggingClicks) {
            LoggingClicks = true;
        }
        if (LoggingClicks) {
            sendMessage("Logging clicks set to false");
            LoggingClicks = false;
        }
    }

if (command.startsWith("ipban") && playerRights > 1) {
		try {
			String otherPName = command.substring(6);
			int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

			if (otherPIndex != -1) {
				client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

				p.writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, "Ipbans");
				p.disconnected = true;
				yell("["+c.playerName+"] - "+p.playerName+" has been ipbanned!");
				sendMessage("You have ipbanned "+p.playerName+"!");
			} else { 
				sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); 
			}
		} catch (Exception e) { 
			sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to ip ban..");
                }
            }
        }
    }

    if (command.startsWith("banuser") && playerRights >= 2) {
        String victim = command.substring(8);

        PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Admin:" + playerName + " is banning "
                + victim;
        sendMessage("Player " + victim + " successfully banned");
        appendToBanned(victim);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;

[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 07, 2009, 01:23:56 am[/size][hr]ok this is my ::banuser code (it works perfectly!) is it possible to change this to a ::ipbanning code? and instead of it writing the name of there user into banlogs.txt, can some 1 make it send it to ipbanlogs.txt and make it type ther ip in it instead of the name of user

        if (command.startsWith("banuser") && playerRights >= 2) {
            String victim = command.substring(8);

            PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Admin:" + playerName + " is banning "
                    + victim;
            sendMessage("Player " + victim + " successfully banned");
            appendToBanned(victim);
            BufferedWriter bw = null;

            try {
                bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
                bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
                bw.newLine();
                bw.flush();
            } catch (IOException ioe) {
                ioe.printStackTrace();
            } finally {
                if (bw != null) {
                    try {
                        bw.close();
                    } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                        sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
                    }
                }
            }

            try {
                bw = new BufferedWriter(
                        new FileWriter(
                                "C:/Documents and Settings/USER/Desktop/newest update/brandons server=client/Warscape server v2/logs/banlogs.txt",
                                true));
                bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
                bw.newLine();
                bw.flush();
            } catch (IOException ioe) {
                ioe.printStackTrace();
            } finally {
                if (bw != null) {
                    try {
                        bw.close();
                    } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                        sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
                    }
                }
            }

[code]if (command.startsWith(“ipban”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

			if (otherPIndex != -1) {
				client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

				p.writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, "Ipbans");
				p.disconnected = true;
				yell("["+c.playerName+"] - "+p.playerName+" has been ipbanned!");
				sM("You have ipbanned "+p.playerName+"!");
			} else { 
				sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
			}
		} catch (Exception e) { 
			sM("Try entering a name you want to ip ban..");
		}
	}[/code]

[/quote]

Why is the try and catch block so indented?[/quote]

don’t know and quite frankly don’t care.

item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“IceTICKER, post:4, topic:318072”]if (command.startsWith(“ipban”) && playerRights > 2) {
p.writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, “ipbans”);
p.disconnected = true;
sM(“You have ipbanned “+p.playerName+”!”);
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering a name you want to ip ban…”);
}
}[/quote]

WTF is that?

[quote=“djdoyle1, post:5, topic:318072”]if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && playerRights == 3) { // With help with djdoyle1
String victim = command.substring(6);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim.playerName;
victim.disconnected = true;
appendToIpBanned(victim.playerLastConnect);
} else {
sendMessage(“Your not owner!”);
} catch (Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Enter the name stupid”);
}
}[/quote]

WTF is that?

item.title: ~~~Can Someone Fix My IPBAN Code?~~~
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

hey i have been trying to fix this for so long now and it still dont work. for now i have to go into my server/data/ipbanlogs and save ip there. this is my ::ipban (user) code that dont work

        }

        if (command.startsWith("ipban") && playerRights >= 2) {
            String victim = command.substring(6);
            int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
            client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];
	    appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
            v.disconnected = true;
            sendMessage("player successfully ip banned");
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ " was pissed off soo much he  IPBANNED the idiot named " + command.substring(5);
            BufferedWriter bw = null;

            try {
                bw = new BufferedWriter(
                        new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true));
                bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
                bw.newLine();
                bw.flush();
            } catch (IOException ioe) {
                ioe.printStackTrace();
            } finally {
                if (bw != null) {
                    try {
                        bw.close();
                    } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                        sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
                    }
                }
            }
        }
